info.name: Kenshi
info.description: A nicer layout of the site, to go with the "More Fitting GUI" mod.
info.additionalInfo:
July 2nd, 2013
- Fix Download button graphic, as the DOM changed.

Initial Release
- "Georgia" font.
- Increased the size of the navigation.
- Eroded Western style logo.
- A brighter illustrated background.
- Rust and stone styled content.
